actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide transportation for employees of Haleakala National Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide transportation for Federal employees of Haleakala National Park, in order to alleviate hardships incurred outside of regular working hours.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide transportation for employees of Haleakala National Park, and for other purposes.
